speaker: Nina
text: So, the root cause was traced to a configuration error in the load balancer.
ipa: soʊ ðə ruːt kɔːz wəz treɪst tu ə ˌkɒn.fɪˈɡjʊə.reɪ.ʃən ˈɛr.ər ɪn ðə loʊd ˈbæl.ənsər
linking: "cause was" → /kɔːz wəz/ (z + w linking), "error in" → /ˈɛr.ər ɪn/ (r + ɪ linking)

speaker: Omar
text: I heard it had already been flagged during staging, but the alert was ignored.
ipa: aɪ hɜrd ɪt həd ɔːlˈrɛdi bɪn flæɡd ˈdʊr.ɪŋ ˈsteɪ.dʒɪŋ bət ði əˈlɜrt wəz ɪɡˈnɔrd
linking: "had already" → /həd ɔːlˈrɛdi/ (d + ɔ linking), "alert was" → /əˈlɜrt wəz/ (t + w linking)

speaker: Nina
text: Exactly. The issue should have been addressed before deployment. QA was informed, but it seems no follow-up was made.
ipa: ɪɡˈzæktli. ði ˈɪʃu ʃəd həv bɪn əˈdrɛst bɪˈfɔr dɪˈplɔɪ.mənt. ˌkjuːˈeɪ wəz ɪnˈfɔrmd bət ɪt simz noʊ ˈfɒloʊ ʌp wəz meɪd
linking: "should have" → /ʃəd həv/ (d + h linking), "follow-up was" → /ˈfɒloʊ ʌp wəz/ (p + w linking)

speaker: Omar
text: Yeah, and the rollback was delayed because the pipeline had been locked by another process.
ipa: jæ ənd ðə ˈroʊlˌbæk wəz dɪˈleɪd bɪˈkəz ðə ˈpaɪp.laɪn həd bɪn lɒkt baɪ əˈnʌðər ˈproʊ.ses
linking: "rollback was" → /ˈroʊlˌbæk wəz/ (k + w linking), "had been" → /həd bɪn/ (d + b linking)

speaker: Nina
text: A post-mortem is being prepared, and a new escalation workflow will be proposed during the review.
ipa: ə poʊst ˈmɔr.təm ɪz ˈbiɪŋ prɪˈpɛrd ənd ə nu ˌɛs.kəˈleɪ.ʃən ˈwɜrk.floʊ wɪl bi prəˈpoʊzd ˈdʊr.ɪŋ ðə rɪˈvju
linking: "being prepared" → /ˈbiɪŋ prɪˈpɛrd/ (ŋ + p linking), "will be" → /wɪl bi/ (l + b linking)

speaker: Nina
text: Yes, a statement was drafted and was sent out last night. We even had it translated into Spanish and Portuguese.
ipa: jɛs ə ˈsteɪt.mənt wəz ˈdræf.tɪd ənd wəz sɛnt aʊt læst naɪt. wi ˈi.vən həd ɪt trænsˈleɪ.tɪd ˈɪn.tu ˈspæn.ɪʃ ənd ˈpɔr.tʃəˌɡiːz
linking: "was drafted" → /wəz ˈdræf.tɪd/ (z + d linking), "sent out" → /sɛnt aʊt/ (t + aʊ linking)

speaker: Omar
text: Good. From now on, alerts must be acted on immediately. No exceptions.
ipa: ɡʊd. frəm naʊ ɒn əˈlɜrts məst bi ˈæk.tɪd ɒn ɪˈmi.di.ətli. noʊ ɪkˈsɛp.ʃənz
linking: "alerts must" → /əˈlɜrts məst/ (s + m linking), "acted on" → /ˈæk.tɪd ɒn/ (d + ɒ linking)

speaker: Nina
text: Totally agree. And more observability needs to be added — we shouldn’t be relying on logs alone.
ipa: ˈtoʊ.tə.li əˈɡri. ənd mɔr əbˌzɜr.vəˈbɪl.ə.ti nidz tu bi ˈæd.ɪd — wi ˈʃʊd.ənt bi rɪˈlaɪ.ɪŋ ɒn lɔɡz əˈloʊn
linking: "shouldn't be" → /ˈʃʊd.ənt bi/ (t + b linking), "relying on" → /rɪˈlaɪ.ɪŋ ɒn/ (ŋ + ɒ linking)
